TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sulai-iaz, title = Sulai-iaz, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sulai-iaz} }

S.FORM: Sulai-iaz Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Sulai-iaz a niyaro', 111 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 491 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 474 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun85%, Amis1%, Paiwan3%, Puyuma1%, Rukai1%, roma5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Solai-iaz Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Solai-iaz a niyaro', 111 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 491 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 474 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon85%, Amis1%, Paiwan3%, Poyoma1%, Rokai1%, roma5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
